paper_abstract: This paper proposes a self-stabilizing edge-coloring algorithm using (Delta + 4) colors for distributed systems of a planar graph topology, where Delta >= 5 is the maximum degree of the graph. The algorithm can be applied to anonymous uniform systems and its time complexity is O(n(2)) moves under the central daemon model. (c) 2006 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A self-stabilizing (Delta+4)-edge-coloring algorithm for planar graphs in anonymous uniform systems
